welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Monfalcone, a charming city known for its rich history, delicious cuisine, and scenic landscapes. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in our vibrant culture and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal building serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo flights and shipments.
